row.process: : SET &NAME# = SYS_ACT_ME_NAME() : SET &STATUS# = GET_UC_OBJECT_STATUS() : p &STATUS# : IF &STATUS# >= 1900 : PSET &TICKET# = GET_VAR(VARA.JIRA,&NAME#,1) : PSET &JIRA_ID# = GET_VAR(VARA.JIRA,&NAME#,2) : IF &TICKET# > "" : PRINT THERE IS a Ticket for JOB: &NAME# Ticket: &TICKET# ID: &JIRA_ID# : PRINT run ACTIVATE_UC_OBJECT for JOB: &NAME# Ticket: &TICKET# ID: &JIRA_ID# : SET &RET# = ACTIVATE_UC_OBJECT("JOBP.TEST_JIRA_CLOSE",,,,, PASS_VALUES) : PRINT Now delete the ticket in VARA.JIRA : DELETE_VAR VARA.JIRA,&NAME# : ELSE : PRINT No ticket for JOB: &NAME# : ENDIF : ENDIF
